snippet.title:
Guests at Spa & Wellness St. Gerlach can relax in comfort in the generous 7x14-meter indoor Roman swimming pool. On sunny days the large sliding doors are opened to an idyllic area where guests can sunbathe. In addition to swimming pool, guests can also relax in a sauna with Turkish bath.
http://www.fivestaralliance.com/luxury-hotels/maastricht/chateau-st-gerlach﻿
Meer weergevenMinder weergeven · Vertalen

Thanx guys and gurls for this beautiful present!!! Let me think.. Who will i take with me to go to the SPA... ﻿
